text: Li Jue (1900 – 1987) (李覺) was a Chinese lieutenant-general. He came from Yunnan, and held several senior posts in the Kuomintang army. In 1949 he defected to the Maoist People's Liberation Army. ==References== *Biography of Li Jue Category:1900 births Category:1987 deaths Category:National Revolutionary Army generals from Yunnan Category:Chinese defectors
title: Li Jue (Kuomintang)
